review: Amazon Fire TV is a very good product. The specs exceed those of similar products on the market, it is easy to install and set up and though Amazon Prime presents in a slightly different format, it is easy to learn. My one disappointment with Amazon Fire TV is that two of the apps that I used most are not available; Acorn TV and RightNow Media. Both are available via one of your chief competitors. That is the only drawback, however, an important one for me.
author: Rob-Julie Miller
